name: Larry 2
description:
This is the Sequel to my First Game, Larry! You will have to dodge obstacles such as, Spikes, and Cannon Balls, to get through each level.

It is similar to the first game, with a few new features and Obstacles! You'll have to play to find out!

If you find any bugs in the game, please let me know by leaving a comment, and I'll get to work on it. Thanks!

Hope you enjoy!
